institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 21 (Use of General Operating Expenses)
contents: Article 21 (Use of general operating expenses) For joint training centers, general operating expenses among the operating expenses subsidized in accordance with Annex 1 of the Regulations, 「Contents of Support for Joint Training Centers」, are included in Annex 1 of the Rules, 「Detailed Standards for Support for Joint Training Centers, etc.」 Accordingly, it must be used for purposes directly related to the consortium business.
